body: I just updated to 1.8 and I seem to get an extra 10 - 15 FPS however I also lag spike a lot more :/ Does anyone know how to fix this?
body_tagged: I just updated to 1.8 and I seem to get an extra 10 - 15 FPS however I also lag spike a lot more :/ Does anyone know how to fix this?
title: 1. 8 lag spikes

replies.body: I get a similar problem, whenever I make a big jump, from a high to a low place, I lag massively and reappear in midair in the jump, and fall into the void.
replies.body_tagged: I get a similar problem, whenever I make a big jump, from a high to a low place, I lag massively and reappear in midair in the jump, and fall into the void.

replies.body: Turn on VBOS and turn off alternate blocks. I get 100-200 fps on my new pc :P
replies.body_tagged: Turn on VBOS and turn off alternate blocks. I get 100-200 fps on my new pc :P

replies.body: Thanks! I turned on VBOS and turned alternate blocks off, and no mroe lag spikes! :D
replies.body_tagged: Thanks! I turned on VBOS and turned alternate blocks off, and no mroe lag spikes! :D

reply_to.body: Turn on VBOS and turn off alternate blocks. I get 100-200 fps on my new pc :P
